allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Blog SEO optimization 2025 + Legal pages + WhatsApp button redesign

Major SEO improvements:
- Updated all 6 blog posts to 2025 with SEO-friendly URLs
- Added meta titles, descriptions, keywords for each post
- SEO-friendly slugs (e.g., /blog/jak-stworzyc-skuteczna-strone-internetowa-2025)
- Updated dates to October 2025
- Fixed breadcrumbs positioning above hero image
- Added Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
- Improved excerpt with keywords

Blog posts optimized:
1. Web Development guide 2025
2. AI in business 2025
3. E-commerce 2025
4. SEO 2025 complete guide
5. Responsive Design & Mobile-First 2025
6. Web vs Native Apps 2025

Legal pages optimization:
- Removed framer-motion from all legal pages for better performance
- Static content: /polityka-prywatnosci, /regulamin, /rodo, /cookies
- Faster loading, smaller bundle size
- Better SEO with static content

WhatsApp button redesign:
- Professional glowing effect (always visible like navbar)
- Added text on mobile: "Napisz do nas na WhatsApp"
- Removed notification badge for cleaner look
- Glass morphism style with backdrop blur
- Green glowing border matching site design
- Smooth hover animations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(for file in app/blog/page.tsx app/blog/[id]/page.tsx app/cennik/page.tsx app/cookies/page.tsx app/kontakt/page.tsx app/o-nas/page.tsx app/polityka-prywatnosci/page.tsx app/proces-pracy/page.tsx app/regulamin/page.tsx app/rodo/page.tsx app/realizacje/[slug]/page.tsx)
Bash(timeout 15 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done; curl -s http://localhost:3000/cennik | grep -A 5 ""<title>""')

Bash(timeout 20 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done; curl -s http://localhost:3000/blog/jak-stworzyc-skuteczna-strone-internetowa-2025 | grep -o ""<title>.*</title>""')
Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:3000 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Server ready""')
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'sleep 3 && curl -s http://localhost:3002/blog | grep -o ""<title>.*</title>"" | head -1')
